name: Mini Micro Racing
description:
Enjoy top down racing games from the 80's and 90's? Well its time to re-live those arcade days and rev those engines.
Mini Micro Racing is a classic style car racing game with 4 players on the same track. Drift your car tokyo style with skidmarks, take the right lines, and sprint your way to the finish line.

Win coins as you go and unlock more micro sports cars for extra speed.

FEATURES
- Absolute top down racing fun at its best.
- Easy driving controls; no need for previous driving games skill.
- Lots of tracks and sports cars to unlock.
- Make money when you win each race.
- Stick to the track or go off road.
- Great voxel style clean art work.

Rev those little machines and put the pedal to the metal!! Players who love grand prix car games will love this too.
